name: MuRoboKart
description:
Unfinished game, rather a demo of my own MuEngine. Spent lots of time on Catmull-Rom random road generator and improving script VM :D

Enjoy the fumes!

Car gfx by Jerry Bremer - thanks, bro!

Music: RaceTrack by FoolBoyMedia downloaded from http://www.freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/sound... on license https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/
